tool_description: Provides a timed, browser-simulated page load function or API call round-trip from the specified geography using a server from that geography.
name: Global Page Load
title: Global Page Load

api_list.name: Global Page Load
api_list.description: Provides performance measurement for a Web page or API call from a specified geographic location

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Url of page or asset to be measured
